products.title: Crop Top
products.description: Straight neckline and one wide strap. Ruching detail.

products.title: Long Coat
products.description: Long coat made of viscose blend fabric. Lapel collar and long sleeves with buttoned straps. Front pockets. Tonal lined interior. Front hidden button closure.

products.title: Cross Body Bag
products.description: Crossbody bag with flap. Removable and adjustable straps, one canvas shoulder strap and another crossbody strap. Magnetic closure.

products.title: Suit
products.description: Straight neckline and one wide strap. Ruching detail.

products.title: Shorts
products.description: High-waisted shorts with belt loops waistband. Front pleats. Front zip and button closure.

products.title: Skirts
products.description: High waisted skort made of gabardine fabric. Side patch pockets. Back hidden in-seam zip closure.

products.title: Blazer Set
products.description: Tailored blazer made of wool blend fabric. Lapel collar and long sleeves. Front flap pockets and chest welt pocket. Interior lining. Front button closure

products.title: Tie Dye Set
products.description: Straight neckline and one wide strap. Ruching detail.

products.title: Top
products.description: T-shirt made of cotton. Sleeveless and round neckline with shoulder pads.
